identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Celebrity Cruises, part of Royal Caribbean Cruises, expands its relationship with West Wayne offices in Coral Gables and Tampa, Fla, by naming agency to handle duties that had been handled by two New York agencies; billings estimated at $30 million to $40 million (S)

block.p: Celebrity Cruises in Miami, part of Royal Caribbean Cruises, said yesterday that it had expanded its relationship with the West Wayne offices in Coral Gables and Tampa, Fla., by naming the agency to handle duties that had been handled by two New York agencies. Billings were estimated at $30 million to $40 million.

West Wayne will begin handling American and Canadian advertising and brand strategy, which had been handled by Saatchi & Saatchi, part of the Publicis Groupe S.A., as well as direct marketing, which had been handled by Lieber Levett Koenig Farese Babcock.

Celebrity Cruises in Miami, part of Royal Caribbean Cruises, said yesterday that it had expanded its relationship with the West Wayne offices in Coral Gables and Tampa, Fla., by naming the agency to handle duties that had been handled by two New York agencies. Billings were estimated at $30 million to $40 million.

West Wayne will begin handling American and Canadian advertising and brand strategy, which had been handled by Saatchi & Saatchi, part of the Publicis Groupe S.A., as well as direct marketing, which had been handled by Lieber Levett Koenig Farese Babcock.

The changes were made without a review. West Wayne will continue to handle the World Wide Web site design and collateral assignments it has worked on for about a year. The Media Edge in New York, part of Young & Rubicam, continues to handle media buying and placement.
